response.overview: A fatalistic poet meets a young and quirky painter who makes the unwise decision to fall in love with him. She lets the connection between them grow, even if it might be just a trap.
response.tagline: A fatalistic poet meets a young and quirky painter who makes the unwise decision to fall in love with him. She lets the connection between them grow, even if it might be just a trap.
response.title: Sex Before Church
